amendment.description: To prohibit contracting with certain biotechnology providers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3841 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3841 proposed by Senator Hagerty to Amendment SA 3748. To prohibit contracting with certain biotechnology providers.
